title.en: Only I Can Speak the Ancient Language of Magic

altTitles.es-la: Sólo yo puedo hablar el antiguo lenguaje de la magia

description.en: Waking up in a fantasy novel set in an ancient magical world was confusing enough for Sisha. But on top of that, she happens to be the only person who could read and understand the old texts recovered from the secret library kept hidden for thousands of years... Furthermore, to Sisha's surprise, the ancient language of forbidden magic turned out to be none other than modern English! With the emperor now praising her ability to decipher the words of Alphabet, Sisha steps up from a mere sidekick to an incredible main lead--in a world where whatever she speaks in her mother tongue is a key to unlock the powerful magic.

Dead Mansion, a Russian private orphanage, trains children to become agents.

The legend of Dead Mansion, codename Sean, which was thought to have been lost due to a "shipping error", has appeared in Korea...?
description.ko:
어린아이들을 요원으로 양성하는 러시아 사설 보육원 '데드멘션'.

그리고 오배송으로 잃어버린 줄 알았던 데드멘션의 전설 '코드네임.

title.en: I Was Just Having Fun With the Time Limit

altTitles.en: I Was Just Enjoying the Deadline

altTitles.es-la: Sólo me estaba divirtiendo con el tiempo límite

description.en: In a previous life I was seriously ill and now I also have an ill character. Perhaps it was my destiny to have a limited lifespan. Nevertheless, I am quite happy. ‘Now I have hair, I'm beautiful, I'm healthy, and I'm a princess, and by the way I can eat lots of delicious food! Life is like a gift. I've decided to make the most of the 21 years that have been given to me.... Until.

‘I’m not a healer!’

2 years ago.
After treating a patient who collapsed in front of my house, patients piled up one after another.
Syrinx, an illegal jewelry craftsman, finds a patient sprawled out in front of her door again…Is this man…the greatest villain in the novel?
Syrinx, who was reincarnated into a novel she had read in her previous life, and Heimdal Wespergo, the villain and final boss in the novel, who came to her house as a patient.

Syrinx never wanted to get involved with the original characters, but she keeps getting involved with Heimdal…

altTitles.ja: 天才魔女の魔力枯れ

altTitles.pt-br: A Bruxa gênia perdeu seu MP

altTitles.vi: Nàng Phù Thủy Thiên Tài Hết Mana Rồi!

description.en: Nayu, the one in a million genius witch who has been the talk of the town, has run out of magic! The price for all the things she has been allowed to do because of her brilliance is coming back to the former genius witch like a boomerang... Then, she meets her past student "Komugi" who loves her very much. This is a boomerang love comedy of karmic retribution by a former genius witch who can't be left alone even though it stings a little, abandoned by her magical powers!
description.pt-br: Nayu, aquela em um milhão de bruxas geniais que tem sido o assunto da cidade, ficou sem magia! O preço por todas as coisas que ela foi autorizada a fazer por causa de seu brilhantismo está voltando para a ex-bruxa genial como um bumerangue... Então, ela lembrou de seu ex-aluno "Komugi", que a ama muito. Esta é uma comédia de amor de retribuição cármica por uma ex-bruxa genial que não pode ser deixada sozinha, mesmo que doa um pouco, abandonada por seus poderes mágicos!

altTitles.ja: 虐殺ハッピーエンド

description.en: High school student Kusakabe Makoto has to work all day to raise money for the treatment of his younger sister, who suffers from a serious illness. The father is unemployed, the mother ran away, leaving the children, bullying at work … Despite all this, he does not lose hope and continues to live for her sister. But having learned that she did not have long, Makoto falls into despair. Fear of the unknown causes him to take a different look at the value of human life.
description.ru: Старшекласснику Кусакабэ Макото приходится работать дни напролёт, чтобы собрать деньги на лечение младшей сестры, страдающей от тяжёлой болезни. Отец безработный, мать сбежала, бросив детей, издевательства на работе… Несмотря на всё это, он не теряет надежды и продолжает жить ради сестры. Но узнав, что ей осталось недолго, Макото впадает в отчаяние. Страх перед неизвестностью заставляет его по-другому взглянуть на ценность человеческой жизни.

description.en: First-year Gilsu Lee transfers schools to run from the bullying and violence. And the new place seems almost perfect. Everyone in his class is friendly and kind, and no one is bullying anybody. Violence? No, we don’t do anything like that in this school. That’s what the “Arena” is for. Don’t forget, Gilsu. What happens in the ring stays in the ring!

title.en: Umineko WHEN THEY CRY Episode 7: Requiem of the Golden Witch

altTitles.ja-ro: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru Episode 7: Requiem of the Golden Witch

altTitles.ja: うみねこのなく頃に散　Episode7:Requiem of the golden witch

description.en: The time for logical debate and magical feints has come to an end; the revelation of the truth about Beatrice the Golden Witch is at hand. To facilitate this, game master Bernkastel has chosen Will Wright the Mage-Hunter to step onto her board and answer a single question: Who killed Beatrice? Joining him in the game is Lion Ushiromiya, Krauss's firstborn and heir, whose role is a mystery in its own right. Will's line of questioning draws together the stray strands from all the previous games, twisting them into a thread of truth, revisiting Kinzou's first encounter with the young Beatrice and working through the legends that have since sprung up around her... [Yen Press]

**"Please sell me. I will become the most expensive lady in Sant'nar"**

Tired of the troubles brought about by his political marriage, debauchee Cesare coincidentally enters into an unusual  contract Adel, a shoeshiner from the slums.

The deadline is three months.

Expecting this to be his liberation from the tedious strategic marriage, Cesare finds himself becoming increasingly concerned about Adel, who behaves unlike any woman he has ever known...

"In the first place, didn't you bring me here to get me engaged to Sir Ezra?"
"That's right."

Cesare replied obediently for a moment before bursting into a sharp laugh.

"But why do I feel so disgusted?"

A male engineer transmigrated into another world, and became a prince. This place strikingly resembles the Middle Ages of Europe, but at the same time, it seems kind of different? Witches truly exist, and they even possess magic powers! Magic powers are productive forces! Save the witches, liberate the productive forces! Open map, fight demons, break conspiracies, climb up the science and technology tree, and open the path of hardcore ‘farming’!
description.ru: Чэн Янь прошел сквозь время и попал в мир, подобный Средневековой Европе, став Роландом, 4-м принцем королевства. Но этот мир не такой, к какому он уже привык. Ведьмы и магия здесь — нормальное явление. Сможет ли Роланд заполучить трон короля и решить выпавшие на его долю проблемы? Только его опыт современных технологий и помощь ведьм, известных как «слуги Дьявола», позволят ему добиться успеха!

description.en:
After the revivification and return of the spirit energy, men and women did their best to capture every strands of spirit energy and train, except Lu Shu, with his Negative Emotion System, he becomes stronger by taunting others! He only wanted to protect his younger sister, but the change of an era in unavoidable, then all he could do was… to taunt others in passing, and become the strongest! Then, are you ready? Here comes Lu Shu, 'The Great Demon King'~  


---

Alt. Official English (WeComics)  
Alt. Official English (MangaToon)

title.en: I'm a Supporting Role in a Horror Game, Don't Kill Me

altTitles.es-la: Soy un personaje secundario en este juego de terror, ¡así que no me mates!

description.en:
In the horror mystery game "Night of the Murderers,"
I inhabited the character destined to be the tenth victim,
the tutor 'Arviche Green'.

The prime suspect is her employer, Duke Rearmend Laycus!

"…A, a murderer."

"Miss Green, you seem convinced that I'm the criminal.
Is that right?"

She lost her life after her last conversation with Laycus.
The remaining life count is two hearts.

'If I use up all my hearts, I really don't know what will happen.
So I need to steer clear of the main plotline of this game as much as possible.'

Arviche's efforts to distance herself from Laycus, the prime suspect,
perversely catches his interest...

"Do you remember when I said you were interesting, Miss Green?
I must retract that statement."

It was a relief to hear that.
The interest of a murderer is nothing but horrifying.

"Perhaps saying you're interesting might not be enough."

[Laycus Rearmend's favorability has increased.]

'...Wait, what? This isn't what I intended.'
A misstep.

Kim SooHyun is an ordinary high schooler who isn’t good at studying, fighting, or being attractive. Suddenly, he’s faced with a quest window right in front of his eyes. After being given the powers of a game [system] out of nowhere, how will our hero confront the challenges ahead of him?
description.ko:
[외모지상주의], [싸움독학], [인생존망]과 세계관을 공유하는 박태준 유니버스 스핀오프 작품!
공부, 싸움, 외모.
뭐 하나 잘난 것 없는 평범한 고등학생 ‘김수현’의 눈앞에 갑자기 퀘스트창이 나타났다!
첫 번째 퀘스트, [엄마한테 사과하기]를 완료한 수현은 보상으로 키가 3cm 커지게 되는데!
퀘스트 엄청 쉽잖아?! 어떤 퀘스트든 완료해주마! 그런데 다음 퀘스트가?
[system] 학교 일진녀와 키스하십시오.
description.ru:
[Действие происходит в той же вселенной, что и «Лукизм» и «Как бороться (вирусный хит)»]

Ким Сухён – обычный старшеклассник. Он не очень хорош в учебе, борьбе и совсем не привлекателен. Внезапно прямо перед ним возникает окно квестов. Получив возможности игровой [Системы] из ниоткуда, как наш герой будет противостоять стоящим перед ним вызовам?

altTitles.en: The best medical god in the city

description.en: "Five years ago, the Ye family was destroyed, and the trash Ye Chen disappeared mysteriously." Five years later, that Ye Family trash is back! He came back with a cultivating body that penetrated the heavens and the earth and cried, "Ghosts and gods!" This time, Ye Chen wants to make the sky fall in awe! Let the Earth tremble! To be in control of everything, to the top of the sky！”

altTitles.es-la: ¡El Mago Cuerpo a Cuerpo Más Poderoso!

description.en:
The academy holds a chilling legend. 

"Neglect practice, become like ‘Luin Ardell."

Luin, the academy’s outcast, cursed with Mana Discharge Disability. But -

"You’re the chosen one, Draka’s harbinger of destruction."

After enduring ridicule for six years, finally, a new opportunity arises.
description.pt-br: 'Luin Ardell' Orador da turma da Academia Mágica Ignit Mais promissor que todo mundo. Mais diligente que todos os outros. Mais talentoso que qualquer outro mago. Isso é o que meu nome significava. Era isso que significava... Até meu aniversário de dez anos. "Você possui um caso raro de 'Transtorno de Evocação de Magia'." Uma maldição que transformou um 'Mago Gênio' que entrou na academia com as notas mais altas em um 'Aleijado Mágico'. Mas então, um milagre me encontrou. "Se não consigo evocar magia, só preciso socá-los!" Força opressiva, punhos amedrontadores, Um Talento Mágico Genial. "Nunca mais vou perder para ninguém."

description.en:
300 years ago, Martial God Kim Hyun-oh defeated Barche, the boss of the Tower of Destruction, and prevented the end of the world. He should have died suffering the same fate as the tower of destruction - however, after 300 years, he is reborn as the 17-year-old Kim Joo-hyuk. 

In the midst, he finds out that the Constellations, that were created during his absence, are his disciples from 300 years ago and sets on a journey to find them.

title.en: Rettougan no Tensei Majutsushi - Shiitagerareta Moto Yuusha wa Mirai no Sekai o Yoyuu de Ikinuku (GIGATOON Studio)

altTitles.ja: 劣等眼の転生魔術師 ~虐げられた元勇者は未来の世界を余裕で生き抜く~ (GIGATOON Studio)

altTitles.en: The Reincarnated Magician With Inferior Eyes ~The Oppressed Ex-hero Survives the Future World With Ease~

description.en: In a world where eye color determines one’s magical prowess, there existed a mage of unparalleled might, Abel. Feared even by allies, he transfers his soul to the distant future in search of an ideal realm. Yet, in this new era, his once-celebrated eyes are dubbed “Inferior Eyes” and he becomes the butt of ridicule. Harassed by high-borne nobles and unjustly discriminated against, Abel discovers that while magic has diminished in this technologically advanced future, his Amber Eyes conceal a power beyond human comprehension. This hero from the past is set to revolutionize the magic of the future!

title.en: I'm a Fake Saintess but the Gods are Obsessed

altTitles.es-la: Soy Una Santa Falsa Pero Los Dioses Están Obsesionados Conmigo

description.en: I reincarnated into the body of a fake saintess who will die when the real saintess appears five years later.If I were to gather the monthly allowance given to the saintess I can at the very least buy a building!But while I was carefully setting up a plan to run away after playing the role of the saintess..."Choose me, or else...""I prepared a prison just for you. My goddess—""..."The male leads reacted differently than I expected. [The bored divine beings have started to gain interest after watching you.]I, Ariel, unexpectedly gained the interest of the gods.On top of that, the final boss who is planning on destroying the world isn't killing me, but helping me...? I have no interest in gaining the interest of the gods or destroying the world! So please just let me become a landlord like I wanted—!

After getting hit by a car & being dumped by his girlfriend, former boxer Yoojun is reincarnated as a girl in a dating simulation game.
To be able go home and his desire see his girlfriend again he must be able to capture the male characters hearts.

In New Pantheon City, monstrous "Voids" have plagued the people for over 500 years. 

However, they are not without their protectors - Immortal Magical guardians are also there to fight back against them.

Living in New Pantheon City is Mars Hino - a troubled outcast. Because of his reputation, vulgar personality, and lack of social finesse, he has found himself entering high school alone.

That is before he meets the hero of the Blunbell district, the magical girl Scarlet Star - who chooses him for a higher duty

altTitles.ja: 全知的な読者の視点から

altTitles.vi: Góc nhìn của Độc giả Toàn tri

description.de:
Damals hatte Dokja noch überhaupt keine Ahnung. Er hatte keine Ahnung, dass sein Lieblings-Web-Roman ‘Drei Wege um die Apokalypse zu überleben’ Realität wird und dass er der einzige ist, der weiß wie der Weltuntergang aussehen wird. Er hatte auch keine Ahnung, dass er letztendlich der Protagonist von diesem Roman werden würde. Jetzt begibt sich Dokja auf eine Reise, um den Lauf der Geschichte zu ändern und die Menschheit zu retten!

description.en: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.
description.es:
En ese entonces, Dokja no tenía idea de que su novela web favorita, Tres maneras de sobrevivir al apocalipsis, cobraría vida y que solo él sabría cómo iba a terminar el mundo. Tampoco tenía idea de que se convertiría en el protagonista de esta novela transformada en realidad. Ahora Dokja debe embarcarse en un viaje para alterar el curso de la historia y salvar a la humanidad de una vez por todas.

description.ja:
「ありえない...これは俺が知っている展開だ。」 10年以上読み続けた小説の最終話を読んだ日、世界は滅亡し小説の世界が現実となった。 平凡で冴えないサラリーマンの主人公・ドクシャ。 そんな彼の趣味はWEB小説『滅亡した世界で生き残る３つの方法』を読むこと。 ついに最終話を読み終えたかと思いきや、作者からのメッセージが届き小説のモンスターと登場人物が突如現れ、新たな世界が幕を開けた！ 「俺は、この世界の結末を知る唯一の読者となった。」 たった一人だけが読み終えたファンタジー小説が現実に。 果たしてドクシャは滅亡した世界を救うことができるのか？

---

title.en: Kurasu ≪Mushoku≫ no Eiyuu-tan ～Koushaku-ka o Tsuihou Sareta ga, Jitsu wa Nagutta Dake de Sukiru o Kakutoku Dekiru to Wakari, Tairiku Ichi no Eiyuu ni Noboritsumeru～

altTitles.ja: クラス≪無職≫の英雄譚～公爵家を追放されたが、実は殴っただけでスキルを獲得できるとわかり、大陸一の英雄に上り詰める～

altTitles.en: Class <<Unemployed>> Heroic Tale: Exiled from the Duke's House, but i found out that i can acquire skills just by punching and now i am climbing to the top of the continent ~
Chronicles of the Jobless Hero~Ousted From the Duke’s Manor, but With Skills Gained Through Punches, I Emerge as the Continent’s Ultimate Hero~

description.en:
In a world where Classes are bestowed by the gods upon everyone when they reach eighteen, the existence of Skills within these Classes tends to overshadow any hard work, setting one’s life path. Within this imbalanced system, Lythe, who trained in hopes of becoming a Holy Knight, was heartlessly classified as Jobless during the Class assignment, resulting in his expulsion from the town by his father, the Duke. As he scraped by as a luggage boy, there came a day when the merchant caravan he was with got attacked by bandits. Lythe, attempting to save the child, engaged in a battle with the skillful attackers, accepting his impending death. Yet, a mysterious voice echoed in his head when he punched a bandit in his last act of defiance…

- [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9583gj/)  (jp)
- [Alternative Raw Link: Niconico](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/58563)
description.ja: 18歳になると神から「クラス」が与えられる世界。クラスの持つ「スキル」の有無は、どんな努力をも上回り、どんなクラスかでその後の人生が決まってしまう。そんな不平等な世界で、聖騎士を目指し訓練してきたリートは、クラス分けで無情にも<無職>を言い渡され、父親である公爵の手により、街を追放されてしまう。そして荷物持ちで糊口をしのいでいたある日、商隊が盗賊に襲われる。子どもを救うため戦うが、戦闘スキル持ちに敵うはずもなくリートは死を覚悟する。しかし、最後の抵抗で盗賊を殴った瞬間、頭の中に不思議な声が鳴り響き…。

title.en: I'm the Heiress of a Villainous Household

altTitles.en: I Am the Heiress of the Villain Family

altTitles.es-la: Soy La Heredera De La Familia Villana

description.en:
Ten years after being reincarnated as an extra in a novel. The day my grandfather, the owner of the house where I grew up, died, of the infamous ducal family of Blasco.

"His Excellency the Grand Duke bequeathed all his assets to the girl Katisha."
"His Highness the Grand Duke."

So my grandfather is the Duke of Blasco? I am struck by the enormity of the inheritance, but it is impossible for "the" Duke of Blasko to leave me alone, even because we are related!

"No, thanks..."
"Cash, excluding inheritance tax and personal deposits at the central bank. You can keep everything else in Blasco's name."
"I want!!!"

title.en: The Dungeon Cleaning Life of a Once Genius Hunter

altTitles.en: The Sagacious Cleaning Life of a Returned Genius Hunter

altTitles.ru: Мудрая уборка жизни вернувшегося охотника за гениями

altTitles.en: Clever Cleaning Life Of The Returned Genius Hunter

description.en:
World’s first SSS-ranked genius hunter, Kim Jun-woo.

He regresses ten years into the past after being ambushed by unknowns one day. With all his hunter skills now locked, he must fulfill his career as a dungeon cleaner to unlock them.

But this cleaner… is extraordinary!

The once renowned hunter, Kim Jun-woo, takes over the cleaning duty with vigorous determination.
description.fr:
Kim Jun-Woo, le premier chasseur de génie de rang SSS au monde.

Il est un utilisateur incroyable de capacité, mais sa personnalité horrible conduit à des problèmes avec sa réputation.

Au milieu de ses problèmes, il a été attaqué et tué par un groupe non identifié.

Quand il a ouvert les yeux, il était retourné dans le passé, il y a 10 ans.

Bien qu’il essaie de redevenir un chasseur et d’élever son rang, ses compétences ont toutes été scellées par le karma de sa vie antérieure.

Pour le libérer, il doit travailler comme « nettoyeur de donjon », un métier réputé pour être extrêmement dur dans cette industrie !

Mais ce nettoyeur, il est différent !
description.ko:
세계 최초 SSS랭크 천재 헌터 김준우.
대단한 능력자지만, 인정머리가 없는 탓에 평판에 문제가 생긴다.
골머리를 썩히고 있는 와중, 정체를 알 수 없는 집단에게 습격받아 죽게 되고,
눈을 떠보니 10년 전 시점으로 회귀한 상태.

다시 헌터가 되어 랭크를 올리려 했지만, 이전 생의 업보로 인해 스킬을 모두 봉인 당하고,
해제를 위해서는 업계에선 극한 직업으로 유명한 '던전 청소부'로 일을 해야 하는데?!

하지만 이 청소부, 남다르다!
몬스터는 물론이거니와, 골깝떠는 헌터, 자리만 차지하는 낙하산 상사, 심지어 동료가 될 사람까지
모든 걸 청소할 기세로 깽판을 치는데...

현직 헌터보다 더 강한 전직 헌터의 망나니식 청소가 시작된다!
description.pt-br:
Kim Jun-woo, o primeiro caçador genial de rank SSS.

Ele é um incrível usuário de habilidades, mas sua personalidade horrível trás problemas para sua reputação.

No meio de seus problemas, ele foi atacado e morto por um grupo não identificado. E quando abriu os olhos, havia retornado 10 anos para seu passado.

Embora ele tente voltar a ser um caçador e aumentar seu rank, as habilidades dele foram seladas pelo karma de sua vida passada.

Para conseguir libertar suas habilidades, ele precisa trabalhar como um “Limpador de Dungeons”, que tem a fama de ser incrivelmente difícil! Mas esse faxineiro, ele é diferente!

Não apenas monstros – caçadores problemáticos, superiores conseguindo suas posições por puro nepotismo, e até mesmo seus colegas.

Ele está fazendo a maior bagunça para limpar tudo. O ex-caçador, que é mais forte do que os caçadores atuais, e sua limpeza maluca vão começar!

description.en:
The ability to perfectly copy martial arts, Superior Interior Power!
Qin Tianlang, who was branded as the "World's Greatest Killer," met a miserable death because of this ability.
When he woke up, he had possessed the body of his son, Nam Gungcheon, who had committed suicide three days ago.
Nam Gungcheon, who had been deeply despised because he was the son of the "World's Greatest Killer".

"This time, I will become the "First Heavenly Dragon" in my son's name and take revenge on the world."
description.ko:
무공을 그대로 복제할 수 있는 초견파공안! 
이 능력 때문에 천하대살성이란 오명을 뒤집어쓰고 비참한 죽음을 맞이한 진천랑.
정신을 차려보니, 사흘 전 자결한 아들의 몸에 빙의했다.
대살성의 자식이란 이유로 지독히 멸시받아 왔던 아들 남궁천.

이번 생은, 아들의 이름으로 천하제일검이 되어 세상을 향해 복수해주마.
description.pt-br:
A habilidade para copiar perfeitamente as artes marciais, Poder Interno Superior!
Qin Tianlang, que era rotulado como "O maior assassino do mundo", encontrou uma morte miserável por causa de sua habilidade.
Quando acordou, ele possuiu o corpo de seu filho, Nam Guncheon, que tinha cometido suicídio três dias atrás.
Nam Guncheon tinha sido extremamente desprezado porque ele era o filho do "Maior  assassino do mundo".

"Desta vez, eu me tornarei o 'Primeiro dragão celestial' em nome do meu filho e me vingarei do mundo"

description.en: This is a world where awakened people and alienated beasts coexist. Zhang Ping was lucky to become an awakened person, but his ability was rated as useless. He was unwilling to live a mediocre life, so he resolutely swallowed the contract gem that ordinary people avoided like snakes and scorpions, contracted himself, and became his own summoned beast! From then on, the whole world opened up to him. Ever-changing superpowers, endless alienated beasts, and dangerous parallel worlds, everything is possible.

title.en: Evolution Begins With a Big Tree

altTitles.zh-ro: Cóng Dà Shù Kāishǐ De Jìnhuà

altTitles.ja: 進化する者たち

altTitles.vi: Chuyển Sinh Thành Liễu Đột Biến

altTitles.ru: Моё перерождение в древо: Начало эволюции

description.en:
Reborn as a willow tree!? Resurrection of spiritual energy, rise of all things. The reborn willow has also embarked on the path of evolution. It can evolve infinitely, is it “divine power” or “curse”?

Official Translations:
[Japanese](https://piccoma.com/web/product/146958)
description.ru:
После смерти Юй Цзыюй перерождается и становится… Ивой! 
И неизвестно, сумеет ли он приспособиться к такой знакомой, но в то же время чуждой окружающей среде – ведь так совпало, что его перерождение случилось как раз во время Великой эпохи возрождения духовной энергии. 
Возрождение духовной энергии знаменует возвышение всех существ… 
Рев хищных зверей стал способен сотрясти горы и взволновать реки, а существа с могущественной силой наводнили этот мир в таком количестве, что он вот-вот лопнет по швам. 
Но, несмотря на все это, во время подобной эпохи выросла величественная ива, способная безгранично развиваться и эволюционировать. 
Плоды, что растут на ней, способны даровать другим необычайные способности, а духовная энергия, которую она распространяет, укрепляет силы зверей, что обитают на ее территории. 
… 
Одни величают ее мировым древом – Иггдрасилем, день за днем восславляя его существование! 
Другие – «великим божественным древом», подпирающим небосвод! 
Разумеется, большинство просто зовут его «священным древом», или «проклятым деревом», или же «дьявольским деревом»… Да и еще много как. 
И все же, при любом его упоминании в голосе каждого ясно слышится благоговейный трепет.
description.zh: 黑鸟社新作，重生成为一株柳树！？灵气复苏，万物崛起。重生的柳树也走上了进化之路。能够无限进化的它，是“神力”还是“诅咒”？

altTitles.ja: 銃夢 Last Order

description.en:
Master mangaka Yukito Kishiro returns, accompanied by his most celebrated character, cyborg sweetheart Battle Angel Alita. Meet Kishiro's latest bevy of bizarre and tormented characters and catch up with your favorite and foes!

[Official English](https://kodansha.us/series/battle-angel-alita-last-order-omnibus/)

altTitles.en: The Twin Swords of the Sima Clan

description.en:
"The head of our family is foolish person," thought Cha Wun-Yeop, the servant of the respected sage.

A foolish master, who plays around by his mistress, Chang Sanmi and an upright man, Beom Seosoo, stand in stark contrast as the prince.

“Beom Seosoo, with his upright character, is the most formidable person I've ever known!”

Caught stealing, he faced severe scolding and disgrace, but Cha Wun-Yeop ends up aiding Beom Seosoo against Chang Sanmi's plot.

"But as the eldest son of the Kamseuk Clan, I can’t just stand by and watch."

"I will grow stronger than I am now and deal with of them all."

Determined to seek revenge on Chang Sanmi, Beom Seosoo sets out to gain strength, while Cha Wun-Yeop leaves the Seol family to follow his own path.

"Living life once, I’ll no longer be an orphan or a servant, but live as a transcendent being."

"Freely and with pride, I will roam this vast world."

Practicing his unique martial arts through mystical methods, Cha Wun-Yeop becomes a master, getting closer to the mastermind behind the plot at Seol Kam-Seuk's House.

One day, Cha Wun-Yeop and Beom Seosoo reunite. Cha Wun-Yeop is astonished to see if Beom Seosoo's martial arts.

“As the eldest son of a prestigious family, you use this kind of swordsmanship!”

The man who once criticized him was now walking the same path of martial arts as him!
description.fr:
"Le chef de cette famille est insensé", pense Jawun-yeop, le serviteur du sage respecté.
Le maître insensé qui joue avec sa maîtresse, Chang Sanmi, et l'homme droit, Seolsu Beom, forment un contraste saisissant.
"Seolsu Beom est la personne la plus remarquable que j'aie jamais connue !"

Pris en flagrant délit de vol, Jawun-yeop a dû faire face à de sévères réprimandes et à la disgrâce, mais il finit par aider Seolsu Beom à déjouer le complot de Chang Sanmi.
"En tant que fils aîné du clan Kamseuk, je ne peux pas rester là à regarder. Je deviendrai plus fort que je ne le suis maintenant et je m'occuperai d'eux tous."
Déterminé à se venger de Chang Sanmi, Seolsu Beom se met en route pour devenir plus fort, tandis que Jawun-yeop quitte la famille Seol pour suivre sa propre voie.

"Je ne serai plus un orphelin ou un serviteur, mais je vivrai comme un être transcendant et parcourrai ce vaste monde librement avec fierté."
En pratiquant des arts martiaux uniques grâce à des méthodes mystiques, Jawun-yeop devient un maître, se rapprochant du cerveau qui se cache derrière le complot du clan Kamseuk Seol.
Un jour, Jawun-yeop et Seolsu Beom se retrouvent. Jawun-yeop est surpris de voir les arts martiaux de Seolsu Beom.
"En tant que fils aîné d'une famille prestigieuse, vous utilisez ce genre d'art du sabre !"
L'homme qui l'avait autrefois critiqué suit désormais la même voie que lui en termes d'arts martiaux !

description.en: Uho-yeong had dreamed of becoming a soccer player. However, he was not blessed with the talent and died without realizing his dream, struck by lightning. It was then that the demon Mammon appeared, offering the ability to covet everyone's talents...

title.en: I Lost the Leash of the Yandere Male Lead

altTitles.en: I Lost the Leash of the Blackened Male Lead

altTitles.es-la: Perdí la correa del protagonista masculino yandere

description.en:
I transmigrated into a novel and became the villainess, Serina who comes from the noble Ducal Melford family.  
  
As a well-to-do character, I tried to mind my own business, but the story had other ideas. A self-proclaimed mother brought back a boy – the duke’s heir and a genius wizard -intent on brainwashing and blackening him.  
  
The contents of brainwashing are two things:  
1. Obey our family.  
2. And fall in love with Serina.  
  
Thanks to that, the brainwashed twisted yandere is obsessed with me… I can’t do this. I have to undo the twisted character’s brainwashing! By the way, what’s this situation?  
  
“Now that the brainwashing is gone, I’ll do as I please. So Serina, please, let’s do our best.”  
  
I’ve solved his brainwashing… but why does he seem even crazier than before— Did I make a mistake?

altTitles.ja: ふつうの軽音部

altTitles.fr: La fille qui découvre le rock !

description.en: With a passion for richly textured Japanese rock, first-year high school student Chihiro Hatono steps into the world of the light music club, new guitar in tow. But what awaits her behind those doors...? A drama of unfiltered youth and musical ambition takes the stage!
description.pt-br: Com uma paixão pelo rock japonês ricamente texturizado, a estudante do primeiro ano do ensino médio Chihiro Hatono entra no mundo do clube de música leve, com uma nova guitarra em mãos. Mas o que a espera atrás daquelas portas...? Um drama de juventude não filtrada e ambição musical sobe ao palco!

altTitles.ja: コード：ブレイカー

description.en: Sakurakouji Sakura is a girl who appears modest and graceful but in reality is skilled in martial arts. After witnessing a boy burning people with his blue flame, she is startled to see that the same boy is a transfer student, Oogami Rei. Oogami is a Code Breaker, one who "does not exist". He is a seemingly cold-blooded killer who follows the principle of "an eye for an eye", to "use evil against evil". Convinced that killing is not right, Sakurakouji sets out to stop him and penetrate his icy heart.

altTitles.ko: 신의 눈을 가린 채 입을 맞추면

altTitles.ko-ro: Sinui Nuneul Garin Chae Ibeul Matchumyeon

altTitles.zh: 如若遮住神的眼眸亲吻

altTitles.es-la: Si besas a un dios con los ojos vendados

description.en: One kiss could save my life. As a prophetess, Noemi can see the futures of those she touches. Yet sadly, as the wife of a god, she sees only death in her own fateful future. But then, a sudden kiss with an unruly merchant brings a vision of life. Could he be Noemi’s key to survival? Or will she be unable to escape her destiny?

From elves, fairies, slimes, gift items, devils and more, countless and thousands of reincarnations have led to a new life. I, Lee Seo Jun, have been reborn as a human child!

In the library of my life, where memories of my previous lives remain like fairy tales, I happen to see a past life with the dream life I desperately wanted. On top of that, I’ve been given abilities that grabs people’s attention!

With my hansome face doing all the hard work! My insane acting skills! This time, at long last, I will achieve my dream and become a superstar!

Wet’s dow it! (Baby Accent)

altTitles.en: I'll Just Live as a Villain
I'll Just Live on as a Villainess

altTitles.ru: Я просто буду жить, как злодейка

altTitles.ja: 悪役として生きていきます

description.en:
I reincarnated as the villainess in a book!  
The one who dared to commit attempted murder on the heroine is the owner of this body?  
  
Let’s just live in a quiet place where we have fun and eat! That’s what I thought for a while.  
It was so, so, so cold here in the north, where I was kicked out as a punishment.  
Before I froze to death, I called the Great Demon of Fire and set fire to the fireplace but…  
  
Why isn’t he going back? If you’ve done the job, shouldn’t you go back?!  
I was flustered to find out that I had signed a life contract with a demon just to start a fire but to think that I’d be responsible for relieving his desires!  
  
The bickering romance between a big puppy demon and a small villainess lady!  


---
description.ru:
Главная героиня - злодейка, осужденная за свои злодеяния. Сосланная в далекие края на север, она вынуждена выживать в суровых условиях.  
Рискуя умереть от холода, девушка призывает демона, чтобы он помог ей поджечь отсыревшие дрова.  
- Ты позвала меня, чтобы всего лишь зажечь огонь?  
- Да, просто сделай это поскорее.  
Но демон оказался неиссякаемым источником неприятностей.  
- Раз ты призвала меня, то должна понести ответственность.  
- Понести ответственность? Но с какой стати?  
- Контракт пожизненный.  
История злодейки, которая мечтает о мирной жизни, и демоне Теохарисе, который мечтает, чтобы их контракт был исполнен.

altTitles.ja: 願いのアストロ

description.en:
The new series from Ken Wakui, the creator of Shinjuku Swan and Tokyo Revengers!

As the battle to decide the next leader of the Yotsurugi gang that runs Asakusa is heating up, a meteorite strike suddenly awakens superpowers in the people of Japan. How will Hibaru Yotsurugi, the son of the previous gang leader, come out of this?!
description.fr: Le nouveau manga de Ken Wakui, le créateur de Shinjuku Swan et Tokyo Revengers ! Alors que la bataille pour désigner le prochain chef du clan Yotsurugi qui dirige Asakusa s'intensifie, la chute d'une météorite réveille soudainement des super-pouvoirs chez les Japonais. Comment Hibaru Yotsurugi, le fils du précédent boss du clan va-t-il s'en sortir ?

description.en:
Shigure has appeared in Kangho!
And destroyed Kangho!
This is the story of the people who survived the disaster.

Cheongsu, a disciple of the Volcano sect, who had been hiding his abilities.
For some reason, he was sentenced to three years of solitary confinement in the mountains.

Three years later... 
When Cheongsu leaves the confession hall, he sees Kang Ho, who has been erased.

To find his missing siblings, who might still be alive somewhere.
He wanders through the ruins of Kangho.
description.id:
Shigure telah muncul di Kangho!
Dan hancurkan Kangho!
Inilah kisah orang-orang yang selamat dari bencana.

Cheongsu, seorang murid dari sekte Volcano, yang telah menyembunyikan kemampuannya.
Untuk beberapa alasan, dia dijatuhi hukuman tiga tahun sel isolasi di pegunungan.

Tiga tahun kemudian...
Ketika Cheongsu meninggalkan ruang pengakuan dosa, dia melihat Kang Ho, yang telah terhapus.

Untuk menemukan saudara kandungnya yang hilang, yang mungkin masih hidup di suatu tempat.
Dia mengembara melalui reruntuhan Kangho.

altTitles.ko: 계모인데, 죽음을 피하는 게 너무 쉽다

altTitles.en: As A Stepmother, It Is Too Easy To Avoid Death
It's So Easy to Avoid Death by Being a Stepmother
She's A Stepmother, But It's Too Easy To Avoid Death
Stepmother, It's So Easy to Avoid Death

altTitles.es-la: Seré La Madrastra En Esta Historia, Pero Evitare Mi Muerte Destinada

description.en:
The oven exploded while I was baking bread, and I faced death along with my abusive father, who had come seeking me. Then I woke up in a novel I was reading. “I’m sorry, Mo..ther. I’m not hurt.”

In the body of the villainous stepmother “Leila”, who abused the male protagonist “Hirua” when he was young, but was eventually executed by Hirua when he returned as the emperor! In order to help Hirua leave the stepmother’s wraith and live happily, I encounter the Marquis “Lacias Huppert”, who played a crucial role in the original, and proposed a contractual marriage. “Can we have a real marriage instead of a contractual one?”

“Oh, can I sleep with Mother too?” Contrary to the plan to leave only the two of them after a year, it seems that both the Marquis and Hirua have unexpectedly started to become attached to me.

altTitles.en: I'm Only a Stepmother, but My Daughter Is Just So Cute!
I'm a Stepmother, but My Daughter Is Just Too Cute!
I'm the Stepmother, but My Daughter Is Too Cute

altTitles.es: Solo soy una madrastra pero mi hija es tan linda

altTitles.uk: Я тільки мачуха, але моя дочка така мила!

altTitles.ru: Я всего лишь мачеха, но моя дочь - просто прелесть!
Я мачеха, но моя дочь слишком милая

altTitles.zh: 我是继母，但是女儿太可爱了

description.de:
Sie lebt für ihren Beruf und arbeitet zu viel — bis sie an Überarbeitung zusammenbricht und stirbt. Doch statt ihre Augen für immer zu schliessen, erwacht sie in einer Märchenwelt. Sie steckt im Körper der bösen Stiefmutter! Aber wie kann sie nur das Vertrauen ihrer Stieftochter aewinnen?

Spieglein, Spieglein an der Wand, wer ist die netteste Stiefmutter im ganzen Land?

description.en:
Fairytale stepmothers are notoriously wicked. But after a children’s clothing designer is reborn as young Princess Blanche’s stepmom, she’s determined to break the mold and shower her daughter with love. Now she just has to convince the girl’s cold-hearted father to do the same. In her quest to make a happier home for Blanche, Abigail begins to uncover secrets and schemes within the palace. Will devious forces tear the Freidkins apart, or can Abigail stitch them back into a family?

description.fr:
J'ai été transmigrée en le parfait cliché de la belle-mère jalouse et cruelle! Une mauvaise femme qui a énormément fait souffrir l'adorable Blanche, finissant même par l'empoisonner. Heureusement, le destin se retourne contre elle et la belle-mère finit exécutée par son mari.

Ma petite Blanche est tellement mignonne, je veux la couvrir d'affection et de tous les cadeaux possibles.

Sauf que pendant ce temps là, mon mari pense qu'il s'agit d'un nouveau stratagème pour attirer son attention, mais la seule que je veux, c'est ma belle-fille!

---
Réincarnée en la méchante belle mère de Blanche neige, je ferai tout pour gagné l'amour de cette enfante. Cependant, un obstacle de taille ce dressera sur ma route.

«Je suis aussi le parent de Blanche, j'exige des excuses pour m'avoir tellement méfié.»

«Et si je ne le fait pas?»

«Je viendrais visiter votre chambre ce soir, majesté.»

«...»

«J'ai même réussi a obtenir des culottes vraiment sexy juste pour vous~»

---

我穿越成了白雪公主的恶毒继母？！但是前世的我其实是一个非常喜欢小孩子的儿童服装设计师。明明面对可爱的女儿喜不自禁，但是不论怎么努力，都得不到女儿和丈夫的信任。丈夫觉得我态度大转变，定有阴谋。我到底如何才能在这个充满怀疑的新世界成功的活下去…？

Eu me vi dentro de uma história como a madrasta ciumenta de sua filha que tentou matar com uma maçã envenenada. Eu amaria se pudesse ter a confiança da minha fofa e amável Blanche. Mas- "Hilário, Desde quando você gosta tanto da Blanche?" Esse marido continua em meu caminho!

description.en:
“Until the day humanity falls.”

In the year 2020, Earth’s magnetic poles disappeared and humankind was nearly wiped out by cosmic radiation. Within the span of a hundred years, living creatures began to mutate and devour each other while the remaining humans, numbering in the tens of thousands, struggled bitterly in their man-made bases.

In the Abyss, home to the mutated xenogenics, there lived a sentient little mushroom. Because it had been nourished by the blood and flesh of the deceased human An Ze, not only did it take on a similar-looking human form, but a similar name as well: An Zhe.

An Zhe is determined to go to the human base to search for his spore, which had been harvested by humans. Once there, however, he faces the omnipresent risk of discovery and certain death as he tries to keep his non-human nature hidden from the Judges, whose responsibility is to inspect for and eliminate xenogenics like himself. And of all the Judges, Colonel Lu Feng is the most perceptive and merciless—as soon as he determines that someone is a xenogenic, he will execute that person on the spot.

But An Zhe’s mutation goes undetected by Lu Feng’s eyes, and so a tale of humans and xenogenics unfolds…

Silver Award winner at the 12th Chinese Nebula Awards for Chinese Science Fiction.
description.pl:
Ponury i niegościnny świat po katastrofie ekologicznej. Spustoszoną ziemię bombarduje promieniowanie kosmiczne. Niedobitki ludzkości schroniły się w dwóch ostatnich ocalałych bazach, desperacko próbując przetrwać. Każdy kontakt z obcym organizmem żywym grozi skażeniem genetycznym.

Do bazy ludzi trafia zagubiony chłopak, który w rzeczywistości nie jest nawet człowiekiem. Los styka go z bezlitosnym sędzią, wyszkolonym do tropienia i likwidowania mutantów. Niespodziewanie ich znajomość przeradza się w coś więcej…

Polskie tłumaczenie powieści dostępne tutaj: https://www.wattpad.com/story/251281478-little-mushroom

description.en:
When I opened my eyes, I was in the world of a novel. In order to avoid the fate of a cannon fodder villainess who would end up disappearing early on, I became close friends with the female lead and guided her towards romance with the male lead. But...

Female lead: Evelyn's going to be with me today.

Male lead: What? I can't let that happen.

Excuse me... Why are you two fighting over me?

The sickly male lead, who came to our house in order to recuperate, has no plans of leaving.

'You have to become healthy so you can return to the capital.'

'There's no rush.'

I wanted to act as the bridge between the two before exiting comfortably, but something's clearly gone wrong.

---
Evelyn Monstera knows two things. First, she's been reborn as a mean girl in a fantasy novel, and second, if nothing changes, her cruelty to the main characters will be her undoing. So when the male lead of the novel, Casis Urquio, comes to stay at her manor, all she has to do is stay out of his way. Unfortunately, Evelyn not only causes a fight between the protagonists, but also wins the affection of the male lead too! Can Evelyn set the story straight and get the happily ever after she wants?

---

Cuando abrí los ojos, era la villana de una novela.
Para evitar mi cruel destino, esta vez decidí cambiarlo. En la novela, la villana trató de separar a los protagonistas de la novela, pero esta vez yo decidí ser amiga de la protagonista y ayudarla con el protagonista masculino.
Pero… ¿Por qué el proyagonista masculino se está encariñando conmigo?

description.en:
On Haje, a face genius seen only once every thousand years!

After turning down a sponsorship offer and losing the chance to debut, He vowed never to set foot in the entertainment industry again.

So why was he chosen by an idol-nurturing game system???

No money, no house, no knowledge.

Haje’s experienced nothing but toil and moil in this new life of his. From finding hidden talents and growing to be a respectable idol, to playing mental tug of war against the callous system and even Investigating the past of the possessed character. Haje was busy running around doing this and that!

“This is no good, I’m having fun.”

Que sera sera.

Haje decides to just charge ahead, overcome every challenge, and attack the show business head-on.

This is the genius idol’s strategy to conquer the entertainment industry!

#Did_We_Seriously_Call_Him_A_Decorative_Vase

#The_Skilled_Hunk_Is_Actually_A_Genius

description.en:
Raised to kill like a pack of loyal hounds, the Baskerville children took countless lives as a band of fearsome assassins.

Despite being the shunned illegitimate son of the brood, Vikir served his family faithfully, only to meet his untimely demise at his father’s hands. But when he is inexplicably reborn with a second chance at life, Vikir, armed with the memories and knowledge of his past, swears to rise above the pack and take his revenge.

This time, he's ready to bite the hand that feeds.

description.de:
Als sich vor zehn Jahren das „Gate“ öffnete und unsere Welt sich mit der von Monstern verband, erhielten einige normale Menschen die Macht, diese Monster zu jagen. Sie sind als die „Hunter“ bekannt. Doch nicht alle Hunter sind mächtig. Mein Name ist Jin-Woo Sung, ich bin ein Hunter mit Rang E. Ich bin ein Hunter, der selbst in den einfachsten Dungeons sein Leben riskieren muss, der „weltschwächste“. Da ich keine einzige, hervorstechende Fähigkeit habe, schaffte ich es kaum, das nötige Geld für den Zutritt zu den schwächsten Dungeons zu verdienen … jedenfalls, bis ich in einem Rang D Dungeon einen versteckten Dungeon mit der höchstmöglichen Schwierigkeit fand! Als ich dort letztendlich meinen Tod akzeptiert hatte, erhielt ich eine seltsame Macht, einen Questlog, den nur ich sehen konnte, ein Geheimnis, mit dem ich mein Level steigern konnte! Wenn ich die Quests erfülle und basierend auf den gestellten Aufgaben trainiere und Monster jage, steigt mein Level. Ich werde vom weltschwächsten Hunter zum stärksten Rang S Hunter! 


- [Book <German Edition>](https://altraverse.de/manga/solo-leveling/)

- [<German Edition>](https://altraverse.de/manga/solo-leveling/)
description.en:
10 years ago, after “the Gate” that connected the real world with the monster world opened, some of the ordinary, everyday people received the power to hunt monsters within the Gate. They are known as “Hunters”. However, not all Hunters are powerful. My name is Sung Jin-Woo, an E-rank Hunter. I’m someone who has to risk his life in the lowliest of dungeons, the “World’s Weakest”. Having no skills whatsoever to display, I barely earned the required money by fighting in low-leveled dungeons… at least until I found a hidden dungeon with the hardest difficulty within the D-rank dungeons! In the end, as I was accepting death, I suddenly received a strange power, a quest log that only I could see, a secret to leveling up that only I know about! If I trained in accordance with my quests and hunted monsters, my level would rise. Changing from the weakest Hunter to the strongest S-rank Hunter!

---

La solution ? Les chasseurs ! Ces combattants intrépides n’hésitent pas à foncer au cœur des donjons dimensionnels pour combattre les créatures qu’ils abritent, et y collecter des trésors.

description.it:
10 anni fa, dopo l'apertura di “Portali” che connettono il mondo reale con quello dei mostri, gente comune ha ricevuto il potere di cacciare i mostri all'interno dei Portali. Sono conosciuti come "Hunter". Tuttavia, non tutti gli Hunter sono potenti. Il mio nome è Sung Jin-Woo, un Hunter di grado E, il "più debole al mondo". Senza particolari abilità a mia disposizione, guadagno la mia paga combattendo in dungeon di basso livello… Almeno finché non ho trovato un dungeon della massima difficoltà nascosto in un dungeon di grado D! Alla fine, mentre mi accingevo ad accettare la morte, ho ricevuto uno strano potere, un'interfaccia per le missioni che solo io posso vedere, un segreto per aumentare di livello di cui solo io sono a conoscenza! La trasformazione dal più debole al più forte Hunter di grado S!

十数年前、異次元と現世界を結ぶ通路”ゲート”というものが現れてからハンターと呼ばれる覚醒者たちが出現した。 ハンターはゲート内のダンジョンに潜むモンスターを倒し対価を得る人たちだ。しかし全てのハンターが強者とは限らない。 人類最弱兵器と呼ばれるE級ハンター「水篠　旬」 母親の病院代を稼ぐため嫌々ながらハンターを続けている。 ある日、D級ダンジョンに隠された高難易度の二重ダンジョンに遭遇した「旬」は死の直前に特別な能力を授かる。 「旬」にだけ見えるデイリークエストウィンドウ…！？ 「旬」ひとりだけが知ってるレベルアップの秘密… 毎日届くクエストをクリアし、モンスターを倒せばレベルアップする…！？ 果たして「旬」ひとりのレベルアップはどこまで続くのかーー！！

description.ka: E-კლასის მონადირე ჯინვუ სუნგი ყველაზე სუსტია. ყველა ზემოდან უყურებს, მას არც ფული აქვს, არც სხვა სამუშაო პერსპექტივა. ასე რომ, როდესაც მისი პარტია იპოვის დამალულ დუნგეონს, ის გადაწყვეტს გამოიყენოს ეს შანსი თავისი ცხოვრების უკეთესობისკენ შესაცვლელად… მაგრამ ის შესაძლებლობა, რომელსაც ის აღმოაჩენს, ოდნავ განსხვავდება იმისგან, რაც მას ჰქონდა მხედველობაში…
description.ko:
10여 년 전, 
다른 차원과 이쪽 세계를 이어 주는 통로 ‘게이트’가 열리고 
평범한 이들 중 각성한 자들이 생겨났다.

게이트 안의 던전에서 마물을 사냥하는 각성자.
그들을 일컬어 ‘헌터’라 부른다.

그러나 모든 헌터가 강한 것은 아니다.

내 이름은 성진우.
E급 헌터다. 

저급 던전에서조차 죽을 고비를 넘겨야 하는
‘인류 최약병기’. 

무엇 하나 내세울 것 없는 형편에
저급 던전으로 근근이 생계를 이어가던 그는,
D급 던전 속에 숨겨진 
최악의 난이도의 이중 던전을 만난다.

그리고 결국… 죽음을 맞이하려던 순간,
그는 기이한 능력을 얻게 된다. 

오직 그에게만 보이는 게임 퀘스트 창!
오직 그만이 알게 된 레벨 업의 비밀!

퀘스트를 따라 수련하고
몬스터를 사냥하면 레벨이 오른다.
오직 그 혼자만! 


최약체 헌터에서 최강 헌터로 각성하다!

추공 작가의 인기 판무 소설 <나 혼자만 레벨업>이
웹툰으로 드디어 등장!

description.pl:
Dziesięć lat temu otworzyły się wrota łączące inne światy z naszym. Krótko po tym pojawili się Łowcy, osoby dysponujące mocą by móc walczyć wewnątrz wrót. Historia nasza skupia się na Sung Jin-woo, który jest łowcą rangi-E, nazywanym najsłabszym łowcą. Po incydencie z podwójnym lochem będąc bliskim śmierci zyskuje on nadludzką siłę i jako jedyny może zdobywać doświadczenie by stać się silniejszym. Od najsłabszego do najsilniejszego.

description.ru:
10 лет назад, после того, как открылись «Врата», соединившие реальный мир с параллельным, некоторые из людей получили силу охотиться на монстров внутри «Врат». Они известны как «Охотники». Однако не все Охотники сильные. Меня зовут Сун Джин-Ву, охотник E-ранга. Я тот, кто рискует своей жизнью в самых низких уровнях подземелья. Не имея никаких сверхсильных навыков, я едва зарабатывал необходимые деньги, сражаясь в низкоуровневых подземельях... по крайней мере, пока я не нашел скрытое подземелье с самыми трудными проблемами в подземельях D-ранга! В конце концов, когда я чуть не умер, я внезапно получил странную силу, журнал квестов, который мог видеть только я, секрет для поднятия уровня, о котором знаю только я! Если я тренировался в соответствии с моими квестами и охотился на монстров, то мой уровень повышался. Переход от самого слабого Охотника к самому сильному, Охотнику S-ранга!

description.th:
10 ปีก่อน 'เกต' ที่พาทะลุสู่อีกมิติหนึ่งได้เปิดขึ้น ภายในเกตมีมอนสเตอร์ตัวร้ายที่เหล่าผู้คนที่ถูกปลุกพลังจะต้องกำราบ 
คนเหล่านั้นได้รับการขนานนามว่า 'ฮันเตอร์' แต่ทว่า ไม่ใช่ฮันเตอร์ทุกคนที่จะแข็งแกร่ง
ซองจินอู ผู้ได้รับฉายาว่าเป็นอาวุธที่กากที่สุดในมวลมนุษยชาติ คือฮันเตอร์แรงค์ E ที่แม้กระทั่งในดันเจี้ยนแรงค์ต่ำๆ ชีวิตเขาก็ยังแขวนบนเส้นด้าย
แต่หลังจากที่ได้เข้าไปในดับเบิลดันเจี้ยนและรอดชีวิตกลับมา เขาก็เปลี่ยนไป
จากฮันเตอร์ที่กากที่สุด เขาจะกลายเป็นผู้ที่แกร่งที่สุด!

description.es-la: Sung Jinwoo es un cazador de rango E, considerado como el nivel más bajo dentro de la Asociación de cazadores, por lo que se le conoce como “El cazador más débil”. Día tras día pone en peligro su vida y se embarca en misiones del rango más bajo para poder sufragar los gastos de su madre enferma; sin embargo, en una de esas misiones, lo que en un principio parecía un raid de rango D termina por ser una mazmorra de un nivel inusitado y las cosas empiezan a torcerse… ¿Lograrán Sung y sus compañeros salir con vida?
description.pt-br:
Dez anos atrás, depois do "Portal" que conecta o mundo real com um mundo de montros se abriu, algumas pessoas comuns receberam o poder de caçar os monstros do portal. Eles são conhecidos como caçadores. Porém, nem todos os caçadores são fortes. Meu nome é Sung Jin-Woo, um caçador de rank E. Eu sou alguém que tem que arriscar a própria vida nas dungeons mais fracas, "O mais fraco do mundo". Sem ter nenhuma habilidade à disposição, eu mal consigo dinheiro nas dungeons de baixo nível… Ao menos até eu encontrar uma dungeon escondida com a maior dificuldade dentro do Rank D! No fim, enquanto aceitava minha morte, eu ganhei um novo poder…

description.zh-hk:
十幾年前，世界上出現了
連接異次元與這個世界的通道「傳送門」， 
而人群中還出現了覺醒之人。 

在傳送門裡狩獵魔物的覺醒者們，
又被稱為「獵人」。

然而並不是所有獵人都很強。

我叫成振宇， 
是個E級獵人。

我是連在低級地下城裡都得拼命 
才能死裡逃生的「人類最弱兵器」。

altTitles.ja: 片喰と黄金

description.en:
Ireland, 1849. After losing everything in the Great Famine, Amelia and Connor 
immigrated to the United States of America in order to find happiness 
and become rich in California during the Gold Rush period.

title.en: I Became the Contract Daughter of the soon-to-be-ruined Family

altTitles.ko: 곧 망할 가문의 계약직 딸이 되었다

description.en:
I thought I had regressed from this ragged life, but why has my time-limited life remained the same?
I'm ruined... is this how I should live my life...?

"This time, I'll get adopted by a normal family, and live in comfort for the rest of my life!"

Step by step, I'm going to take revenge against the one behind my death, and I'll protect what's left of my small and precious life!

However, did I put in too much effort?

"Anisha, you're perfect."

"I'm going to make this child a future professor."

All I wanted was to survive...

"Well, somehow, you’ve passed. I'll have to adopt this brat."

I ended up with a tycoon I didn't expect.
One whose household will be massacred in a few years!

How do I know that?
Me too! I didn't want to! Know that!

But what can I do? The milk has already been spilt.
I'll just live in bliss while acting as the real daughter during my 5 years contract, then I'll leave!

However...

"...I happened to pick this up on the way home."
"Father, you're the best!"
"I know."

...Something's wrong.

"I checked this out 'myself', and inspected it 'in person'. There's nothing to be grateful for."
"Father, you're a genius!"
"I know this too."

No, well, something's REALLY wrong.

**

I became fond of this unique and strange family, but...

"The five years contract we signed,"
"Let's nullify it."

While looking straight into my eyes, dad announced the termination.

"I can help you, but you'll still die anyway."

Not only that,
But death came under my nose too.

Will I be able to survive?

altTitles.ja: 青のオーケストラ

description.en:
Aono Hajime was a prodigy violinist until he grew jaded with playing the violin due to personal reasons. 
Now in his third year of middle school, he struggles to decide his academic path. 
One day in school, he meets Akine Ritsuko, a hotheaded novice violinist who wants to enroll in a high school with a distinguished orchestra club. 
When he finds himself getting closer to Ritsuko and being brought back to the world of violinists, time starts moving again for him.  
  
This is the beginning of a youthful drama where sounds and hearts alike resound in harmony.

---
- **Won the 68th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 2023, which it shared alongside Call of the Night**
description.tr: Aono Hajime, kişisel nedenlerden dolayı keman çalmayı bırakana kadar harika bir kemancıydı. Şimdi ortaokulun üçüncü yılında akademik yoluna karar vermek için mücadele ediyor. Bir gün okulda, seçkin bir orkestra kulübü olan bir liseye kaydolmak isteyen agresif, acemi bir kemancı olan Akine Ritsuko ile tanışır. Kendisini Ritsuko'ya yaklaşırken ve kemancıların dünyasına geri getirilirken bulan Aono için zaman tekrar hareket etmeye başlar. Bu, seslerin ve kalplerin benzer şekilde uyum içinde olduğu genç bir dramanın başlangıcıdır.
